input.sentences: as they were getting ready to show their support they were handed posters .
the work was hard but worth it .
the construction would be soon over .
afterwards they all celebrated with music .
they brought out the guard to honor them .
output.sentences: The community came out to help get donations for a new building.
Once they recieved enough donations, they packed up their signs.
The community got together to build a local center for vets when they return home.
The local school band came out to play during the grand opening.
The local military unit was very excited for the new community center for the vets
